subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: New QuikScript font: QuikScript Geometric
msgSnippet: Yes, go to image #3 to see the whole alphabet. It stays close to the line, with a smooth flow and only one way to make each sound. There is also a dictionary
messageBody:
Yes, go to image #3 to see the whole alphabet. It stays close to the line, with a smooth flow and only one way to make each sound. There is also a dictionary available that shows the differences between such words as read (verb) and read (participle) or present (noun) and present (verb). 

John

On Feb 11, 2018, at 4:38 PM, Tinyallen@... [Read_Alphabet] <Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com> wrote:

 

   For anyone curious, here is a link (apparently) to the ToneText system mentioned.

http://www.tonetext.net/

Yes, go to image #3 to see the whole alphabet. It stays close to the line, =
with a smooth flow and only one way to make each sound. There is also a dic=
tionary available that shows the differences between such words as read (ve=
rb) and read (participle) or present (noun) and present (verb).

John
